header.title: mChat Bot
header.description: Addon for phpbb mChat. mChat Bot is a bot, which replies text/word for what users say on the mChat. In the ACP you can define text/word on which the bot will reply. You can choose between reply or random text.
header.author-notes: This mod is based on Robocik 2.0.1 for phpbb by przemo created by kozioÅ‚ek.

changelog.change: FIX ACP error with Undefine index
Bot will not reply when the category doesn't exist or it doesn't contain any text.
Bot will not reply when the bot reply is empty.
FIX problem with adding words and create categories
Improved ACP Bot text - can move text up and down
FIX problem when mChat Bot was deleted

action-group.diy-instructions: Go to ACP, create the bot and then turn the mod on.
